notifications.email.events.user__created.value: [Default] A new account was made for you on Dispatch

notifications.sms.events.job__paused.tem.value: Hi {{#if recipient.first_name}}{{{recipient.first_name}}}{{else}}{{job.customer.first_name}}{{/if}}! {{organization.name}} has placed the job request on hold. Find their information here {{links.survey}}

notifications.sms.events.job__created.te.value: You have a new job offer from {{{account.title}}}. Open the Dispatch app to view the job details.

notifications.sms.events.appointment__sc.value: Hi {{#if recipient.first_name}}{{{recipient.first_name}}}{{else}}{{job.customer.first_name}}{{/if}}! Your service appointment with {{{organization.name}}} at {{job.address.street_1}} has been scheduled for {{appointment.localDateLong}}. Your technician will arrive between {{appointment.localTime}}.

notifications.sms.events.appointment__en.value: Hi {{#if recipient.first_name}}{{{recipient.first_name}}}{{else}}{{job.customer.first_name}}{{/if}}, {{organization.name}} is on the way! You can use the link below to track their arrival. {{links.webTracker}}

notifications.sms.events.appointment__ca.value: Hi {{#if recipient.first_name}}{{{recipient.first_name}}}{{else}}{{job.customer.first_name}}{{/if}}, {{organization.name}} has canceled your appointment on {{appointment.localdatelong}} at {{job.address.street_1}}

notifications.sms.events.user__created.t.value: Welcome to Dispatch! To install the app, go to {{urls.get}} from your mobile device.

notifications.sms.events.job_offer__enti.value: You have a new job offer from {{account.title}}. Open the Dispatch app to view the job details.

notifications.email.events.job__message_.value: {{customer.full_name}} Sent you a Message in Dispatch.me

notifications.sms.events.job__complete.c.value: Thank you for choosing {{organization.name}}. A Sub-Zero survey will be sent to you shortly.

notifications.sms.events.job__accepted.t.value: Hi {{#if recipient.first_name}}{{{recipient.first_name}}}{{else}}{{job.customer.first_name}}{{/if}}! {{{organization.name}}} will reach out to schedule an appointment shortly. Find their information here {{links.survey}}
